parameters.name: AliyunLang
parameters.description:
The language. Valid values:

*   zh (default value): Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: ConfigYaml
parameters.description: The YAML configuration file of the ServiceMonitor.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Checks whether the format is valid and whether targets are matched.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace where the PodMonitor resides.
